description: The IB_MESSAGES table contains basic information about In Basket messages.

columns.name: MSG_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the In Basket Message.

columns.name: CREATE_TIME
columns.description: The time the message record was created.

columns.name: REGARDING_TOPIC
columns.description: A short description of the message contents.

columns.name: PAT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the patient record for this row. This column is frequently used to link to the PATIENT table.

columns.name: PAT_ENC_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The encounter date of the patient associated with this message.

columns.name: SENDER_USER_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the sender (networked to the User master file).

columns.name: NAME_OF_CALLER
columns.description: The name of the caller.

columns.name: TRANSCRIPTION_LINE
columns.description: This is the ID of the dictation transcription for a transcription created outside of Epic and sent to In Basket through an interface.  It is networked to the Notes (HNO) master file.

columns.name: ORDER_PROC_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order procedure (networked to the Orders master file).

columns.name: ORDER_MED_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the order procedure (networked to the Orders master file).

columns.name: ORD_DATE_REAL
columns.description: The internal date of the ordered procedure.

columns.name: PAT_EMAIL_RESP_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if the patient wants an e-mail response to their In Basket message.  Y indicates that the patient does want an e-mail response and N indicates that the patient does not want an e-mail response.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


YES


NO

columns.name: APPT_STATUS_C
columns.description: Appointment Notification Email Message Type - The Appointment Status of the specific encounter

columns.name: CANCEL_REASON_C
columns.description: Appointment Notification Email Message Type - If the APPT_STATUS_C column is canceled, this column contains the link to the reason for cancellation

columns.name: PAT_ENC_CSN_ID
columns.description: A unique serial number for this encounter. This number is unique across all patients and encounters in the system. This column should be replaced with IB_MESSAGE_PAT_ENCS.PAT_ENC_CSN_ID instead. Historical records will still have this data populated, as well as data moving forward, but it may not contain all of the encounter contact serial numbers (CSNs) as the new column and table would

columns.name: PAT_ORDENC_DT_REAL
columns.description: The new orders only encounter associated with this message. This will be used if a reflex action is performed on a result and the original contact is owned elsewhere.

columns.name: DICT_HNO_ID
columns.description: This is the ID of the dictation transcription for a dictation transcribed in Epic (not in a third party system).  It is networked to the notes (HNO) master file.

columns.name: TASK_ID_ID
columns.description: Stores the task ID this message is associated with

columns.name: REFERRAL_ID
columns.description: Stores referral record that is related to the In Basket message

columns.name: CLAIM_ID
columns.description: Stores claim record that is related to the In Basket message

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID
columns.description: Stores the Care Everywhere organization related to this message

columns.name: ORGANIZATION_ID_EXTERNAL_NAME
columns.description: Organization's external name used as the display name on forms and user interfaces.

columns.name: QUERY_OUTCOME_C_NAME
columns.description:
Outcome of the Care Everywhere search.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Successful


Unsuccessful

columns.name: QUERY_INSTANT
columns.description: Instant the query was performed

columns.name: QUERY_USER_NAME
columns.description: User who performed the query

columns.name: QUERY_ENC
columns.description: Encounter associated with the query

columns.name: QUERY_ENC_PROV
columns.description: Provider for the encounter associated with the query

columns.name: QUERY_DEPT
columns.description: Login department for the user performing the query

columns.name: QUERY_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
Reason for performing the query


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Other


Automatic System Request


PCP Review


Emergency Visit


Referral


Scheduled Visit


Urgent Care


Walk In


Admission


Phone / E-mail Encounter


Care Coordination


Background Batch Request


Background Verification Query


Data Request

Chart Gateway Targeted Query


Patient Portal Initiated


Chart Correction

Switch from Standalone to Gateway


Orders Anywhere Query


Prior Authorization


Payer Platform ADT


Payer Platform Update Notification


Payer Platform Scheduled Appointment


Network Affiliation


Patient Newly Enabled


Book Anywhere


Automatic Query to Payer Before Appointment


Treatment


Payment


Healthcare Operations


System Administration


Fraud Detection


Psychotherapy


Training


Legal Disclosure


Marketing


Facility Directory


Family Disclosure


Individual Present Disclosure


Emergency


Disaster Relief


Public Health

Judicial Disclosure


Law Enforcement Disclosure


Deceased Disclosure


Organ Donation Disclosure


Research Disclosure


Health Safety Threat


Government Disclosure


Workers Compensation


Insurance or Disability Coverage Disclosure


Request of the Individual

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_NAME
columns.description: Patient name used for the query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_STATE
columns.description: State used for the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_ZIP
columns.description: Zip code used for the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_SEX_C_NAME
columns.description:
Sex used during the patient query


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Female


Male


Unknown


Nonbinary


X


Other

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_DOB_DT
columns.description: Date of birth used for the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_SSN
columns.description: SSN used for the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_HOME_PH
columns.description: Home phone number used for the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_WORK_PH
columns.description: Work phone number used during the patient query

columns.name: QUERY_PAT_CELL_PH
columns.description: Cell phone number used during the patient query

columns.name: MYCHART_HNO_ID
columns.description: Note ID for a message that is a result of a 3rd party questionnaire being submitted.

columns.name: PEF_MSG_TYP_C_NAME
columns.description:
Type of a patient-entered flowsheet message, either Alert or Notification.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Notification Message


Alert Message

columns.name: PEF_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: For patient-entered flowsheet messages, the episode ID that the flowsheet is a part of.

columns.name: PEF_LAST_NOTIF_DAT
columns.description: Last notification date of a patient-entered flowsheet message.

columns.name: PEF_INSTANT_SVD_TM
columns.description: For patient-entered flowsheet messages, the date and time the patient entered the data that triggered this message.

columns.name: NCS_ID
columns.description: This column extracts the linked Customer Relationship Management record (NCS master file).

columns.name: DENTAL_TRT_PLAN_ID
columns.description: Stores dental treatment plan ID.

columns.name: DTP_PMT_PLAN_LINE
columns.description: Stores orthodontic payment plan line.

columns.name: DEFICIENCY_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The deficiency type category number for the In Basket message.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Surgery Report


Admission Diagnosis


Discharge Summary


Anesthesiology Report

columns.name: TRANSCRIPT_NOTE_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the note that this In Basket deficiency creation error occurred for.

columns.name: LAB_RESULT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the result record of the In Basket message.

columns.name: LAB_HOLD_LN
columns.description: The line number of the hold of the specimen associated with this In Basket message.

columns.name: LAB_REQ_ID
columns.description: Stores a pointer to a requisition record (REQ). The REQ record may be a requisition, a case, or both.

columns.name: LAB_AP_CASE_NUM
columns.description: The case number is the Anatomic Pathology accession number.

columns.name: AN_MSG_REASON_C_NAME
columns.description:
The reason the message was sent from Anesthesia.


May contain organization-specific values: Yes


 Category Entries: 


Need Relief

columns.name: FREE_TEXT_SIG
columns.description: Free text sig received from a pharmacy interface.
